00039 static int
00040 handle_sigquit(int sig, int code, struct sigcontext *scp)
00041 {
00042     if (util_restart_save_state()) {
00043         /* we are restarting ! -- return from signal */
00044 
00045     } else {
00046         /* copy stack to user data space */
00047         stack_lo_addr = util_save_sp;
00048         stack_size = stack_hi_addr - stack_lo_addr + 1;
00049         save_stack_base = sbrk(stack_size);
00050         (void) memcpy(save_stack_base, stack_lo_addr, stack_size);
00051 
00052         /* write a new executable */
00053         (void) fprintf(stderr, "Writing executable %s ...\n", new_file_name);
00054         (void) util_save_image(old_file_name, new_file_name);
00055 
00056         /* terminate if signal was a QUIT */
00057         if (sig == SIGQUIT) {
00058             (void) _exit(1);
00059         }
00060     }
00061 }

00064 static void
00065 restart_program()
00066 {
00067     (void) fprintf(stderr, "Continuing execution ...\n");
00068 
00069     /* create the stack */
00070     grow_stack();
00071 
00072 #ifdef vax
00073     asm("movl _util_save_sp,sp");
00074 #endif
00075 #ifdef sun
00076     asm("movl _util_save_sp,sp");
00077 #endif
00078 
00079     /* copy the stack back from user space */
00080     (void) memcpy(stack_lo_addr, save_stack_base, stack_size);
00081 
00082     /* remove the sbrk for the stack */
00083     if (sbrk(-stack_size) < 0) {
00084         perror("sbrk");
00085     }
00086 
00087     util_restart_restore_state();       /* jump back into handle_sigquit() */
00088 }
